name: EHR
body:
### What is this?
This is the GitHub page for the EHR project. Basically what it does is that it allows you to setup a mobile electronic medical record server on a single-board-computer, such as Raspberry Pi, and allows medical experts to access the data through mobile apps.

### Who build this?
We are a team of final year project students from HKUST. Go to our [website](http://hkust1516csefyp43.github.io) and know more about us!

### Who is this for?
This solution is design for One-2-One in Cambodia, but it is completely open source for anyone interested.

### How to access it?
We are also building mobile apps for the solution on iOS (coming soon) and [Android](https://github.com/hkust1516csefyp43/ehr-android). 

### How can I help?
Feel free to create pull requests. If you find bugs or want to see some new features, you can create new issue or email us directly at [hkust1516csefyp43@gmail.com](mailto:hkust1516csefyp43@gmail.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
